Key Match Events: Bebe scored a goal from 40 meters out with help from the goalkeeper
Ryan Mendes scored a goal after a defensive mistake
Kevin Pina scored a superlative goal into the top corner
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde captain Ryan Mendes said, 'I don't know how far we can go. Now we are into the last 16 and we just need to keep working as we have been.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde became the first team to reach the last 16 at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations
Others: Former Manchester United attacker Bebe helped Cape Verde secure the victory
Cape Verde is ranked 73rd in the world
